Item 2.02 - Results of Operations and Fi.content: On January 24, 2023, Johnson & Johnson issued the attached press release announcing its sales and earnings for the fourth quarter and full year ended January 1, 2023.

subsections.exhibits_list: Exhibit No. 99.1: Press Release dated January 24, 2023 for the period ended January 1, 2023. Exhibit No. 99.2: Unaudited Comparative Supplementary Sales Data and Condensed Consolidated Statement of Earnings for the fourth quarter and full year. Exhibit No. 104: The cover page from this Current Report on Form 8-K, formatted in Inline XBRL.
